ROYALTY TICKETS - MARCH 19A7 File 075.1 Dear Sir, I enclose herewith two copies of each of the following Royalty Tickets B.343-2, 3,344.-2 to B,358-l (inclusive) These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run ) from Tanks Nos. 131, 152 and 153 to the Refinery, upon which the Royalty for March 194-7 will be computed. I also enclose five extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries, In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy of the following tickets, viz; i- A,718-2 to A,758-1 (inclusive) These tickets represent the amount of Arabian Crude Oil run from Tanks Nos, 132, 133, 134, and 143t Yours very truly, R. P>.473 25th February, 194-7• H.B .M 's Political Agent, The Political Agency, MANAMA. © ROYALTY TICKETS - JANUARY 1947 File 075.1 Dear Sir, I enclose herewith two copies of each of the following Royalty These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from Tanks Nos. 131, 152 and 153 to the Refinery, upon which the Royalty for January 194-7 will be computed. I also enclose five extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries. In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy of the following tickets, Viz These tickets represent the amount of Arabian Crude Oil run from Tanks Nos. 132, 133, 134 and 143. In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy each of the following tickets, viz:- A.810-2 to A.850 (inclusive) These tickets represent the amount of Arabian Crude Oil run from Tanks Nos. 132, 133, 134 and 143. OYALTY TICKETS - SEPTEMBER 19A7 File: 075.1 Dear Sir, I enclose herewith two copies of each of the following Royalty Tickets:- These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from tanks Nos. 131, 152 and 153 to the Refinery, upon which the Royalty for September 1947 will be computed. I also enclose five extra copies of the Snmmary of Oil Deliveries• In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy each of the following tickets, viz:- These tickets represent the amount of Arabian Crude Oil run from tanks Nos. 132, 133, 134 and 143* 6-439-2 to B-448-1 (inclusive) A-985-2 to A-1030-1 (inclusive) Yours very truly. r * x) iff ' dtj nmr R. HB> V^CP THE BAHREIN PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED A w a 1 i, Bahrein Island, Persian Gulf. 14th DECEMBER 19 PA-452 His Britannic Majesty's Political Agent, The Agency, BAHREIN. Dear Sir; ROYALTY TIC NOVEMBER 1947 . File #075.1 I enclose herewith two copies of each of the following Royalty Tickets:- B.462-2 to B.481 (inclusive). These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from tanks Nos. 131, 152 and 153 to the Refinery upon which the Royalty for November 1947 will be computed. I also enclose five extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries. In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy each of the following tickets, viz:- A.1071-2 to A.1111-1 (inclusive). These tickets represent the amount of Arabian Crude Oil run from tanks Nos. 132, 133, 134 and 143. .n Tours very truly, 1 a ' ' ' R # M. location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order.
The foliation is circled in pencil, in the top right corner. The numbering begins on the front cover with 1 and carries on until 778, which is the last number given on the inside of the back cover.

mods.abstract: The file mainly contains Royalty Delivery Tickets showing the amount of oil delivered to the refinery from December 1946 to November 1947, transmitted by Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO) representatives to the Political Agent at Bahrain.
